revised_title: Vibrational and Rotational Analysis of Dimethyl Acetylene
tldr: The authors studied the vibrational and rotational spectrum of dimethyl acetylene, a symmetrical top molecule, and found evidence of free internal rotation of the methyl groups. They analyzed the absorption bands and confirmed the occurrence of free rotation, providing a more accurate assignment of vibration frequencies. Their findings contribute to the understanding of molecular structure and behavior in symmetrical top molecules.
